Module main.inventory

Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddPart
    The AddPart controller class which enables the user to create new parts
    AddProduct
    The AddProduct controller class which enables the user to create new products
    AlertHandler
    Alert Handler class which manages the alert messages to the user
    ChangeView
    The ChangeView class which manages the changing of views between screens, and simplifies the application by preventing redundant code in each controller class.
    FormValidation
    Form Validation class to validate data input by the user
    IdGenerator
    IdGenerator class which manages the creation of unique IDs for Parts and Products
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu controller class which acts as the main page for the application.
    ModifyPart
    The ModifyPart controller class which enables the user to modify the attributes of an existing part
    ModifyProduct
    The ModifyProduct controller class which enables the user to modify the attributes of an existing product
